Name: Model of Granary with Five Storerooms
Description: The model of a huge granary with five storerooms is painted black, except for the upper part, which is painted white. The doors are yellow with brown lines depicting the handles. Each storeroom has a vaulted ceiling and a small door in the center of its facade. On the left side, a staircase leads inside the granary and, perhaps, to the roof as well.
